component.name: Genspace Collaboration Tool
component.author: Kaiser lab (C2B2)
component.description: Logs user actions to the GenSpace database. GenSpace is a social networking tool which allows patterns of use (putative workflows) of geWorkbench components to be inferred and queried. If desired, (participation is entirely optional) it can be used to identify potential expert users of particular components who may be able provide advice. (Note - this component handles only logging of events. It does not control the Genspace GUI located in the Tools menu).
